metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17346 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service or gain privileges because of anincompatibility between Process Context Identifiers (PCID) and TLB flushes.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
